text: Hugo Ferdinand Boss (8 July 1885 - 9 August 1948) was a German fashion designer and businessman. He was the founder of the clothing company Hugo Boss AG. He was an active member of the Nazi Party from 1931 to 1945. ==References== Category:1885 births Category:1948 deaths Category:German businesspeople Category:German fashion designers Category:Nazis
title: Hugo Boss (fashion designer)
